input.sentences: today was my wedding day | this is me with my lovely husband .
he gave me a huge kiss to seal the deal .
the whole family was there to eat and celebrate .
heres us together about to cut the cake ! it was delicious .
everybody was so happy for us | ill never forget this day .
output.sentences: The bride and groom walked down the aisle.
At the end of the ceremony, they kissed each other.
At the reception, friends wished them well.
The bride was not very fond of the cake.,
But some guests continued to shout praise.
